entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Lac-Mégantic
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:55 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1 with frost.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1 with frost. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
